title: Education Sector Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for sector classifications of education institutions and programs.

terms.label: Public
terms.definition: An institution or program that is publicly governed and funded, typically by a governmental body or public authority.

terms.label: Private Nonprofit
terms.definition: An institution or program operated by a nonprofit organization, not primarily for profit distribution to owners or shareholders.

terms.label: Private For-profit
terms.definition: An institution or program operated as a for-profit enterprise, where owners or investors may receive financial returns.

terms.label: Charter or Special Status
terms.definition: An institution or program operating under a charter, special statute, or similar special status framework within the public system.

terms.label: Tribal or Indigenous
terms.definition: An institution or program governed by or primarily serving a tribal or indigenous community under recognized authority.

terms.label: Other Education Sector
terms.definition: An education sector classification that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
